DescriptionData.Title: Lace Edged Zip 20cm - Acid Green
DescriptionData.Description:
These close ended lace edged zips are perfect when a plain zip just will not do, they add an extra level of detail to any outfit or project. The zip is 20cm long and the zipper has a smooth ball design in a dark metal.
We offer a range of these nylon zips in 24 colours to buy from our online fabric and haberdashery shop.
